Posts.Content: Sep 9, 2008 06:52AM June62008 wrote: I was only in the hospital overnight.  I could have stayed another night, but I choose not to because I was feeling so good.  That may have been a mistake!  Three days later I was re-admitted for internal bleeding and had to have surgery all over again.  That time I stayed for 2 nights!
Posts.Title: How Long in Hospital after Bi-Later with Reconstruction? Mocity mom_of_2
